statements: SELECT * FROM alerts_for_medical_images;
SELECT alert_id, finding FROM alerts_for_medical_images ORDER BY urgency_level DESC;
SELECT patient_id, image_id, urgency_level FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE urgency_level > 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE patient_id = 101 AND urgency_level = 3;
SELECT alert_id, finding FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE image_id = 202 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE urgency_level = 1;
SELECT patient_id, finding FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE urgency_level = 3 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, urgency_level FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE finding LIKE '%broken%' ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE finding ILIKE '%mass%' AND urgency_level > 2 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, urgency_level DESC;
SELECT AVG(urgency_level) AS avg_urgency FROM alerts_for_medical_images WHERE urgency_level >= 1;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT image_id, finding, urgency_level FROM Alerts WHERE finding = 'abnormal'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 60
SELECT finding, urgency_level FROM Alerts ORDER BY urgency_level DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE urgency_level > 2 ORDER BY alert_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT alert_id, patient_id, image_id, finding, urgency_level FROM Alerts WHERE finding LIKE '%tumor%' ORDER BY alert_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM Alerts INNER JOIN Patients ON Alerts.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Alerts.urgency_level < 3 ORDER BY Alerts.alert_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MedicalImages;
SELECT image_id, patient_id FROM MedicalImages ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT finding FROM MedicalImages WHERE patient_id = 'c4406666-319a-4cb7-b0c6-5924c1b124bb';
SELECT patient_id, image_data FROM MedicalImages WHERE finding LIKE '%tumor%';
SELECT * FROM UrgentCases WHERE patient_id = 'd715755b-5260-4e5b-ba77-23b23f0d4517' ORDER BY case_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalImages WHERE finding = 'Abnormal' ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, patient_id FROM MedicalImages WHERE patient_id = 'd7f0e5bd-1efd-4a00-8f64-27f2e5e07d00';
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_priority ASC;
SELECT a.alert_description, u.case_description FROM Alerts a JOIN UrgentCases u ON a.alert_id = u.alert_id WHERE a.alert_priority > 5;
SELECT * FROM MedicalImages m JOIN UrgentCases u ON m.patient_id = u.patient_id WHERE u.case_description LIKE '%emergency%' ORDER BY m.image_id;
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE image_type = 'X-ray';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT image_id, patient_id, image_type FROM Images WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT alert_type, alert_priority FROM Alerts WHERE alert_priority > 5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_type FROM Images WHERE image_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_age ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND alert_priority > 3;
SELECT * FROM Alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, finding_id FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT image_name, image_path, image_date FROM Images WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE admission_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin' OR user_role = 'Manager';
SELECT f.finding_description, i.image_name FROM Findings f INNER JOIN Images i ON f.finding_id = i.image_id;
SELECT u.user_name, COUNT(a.alert_id) AS num_alerts FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Alerts a ON u.user_id = a.finding_id GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING num_alerts > 3;
